lines.text: Wait a minute. We all make mistakes. Let's have some coffee.
Ladies and gentlemen, the Tom Tom Club's own Mistress of Rock 'n' Roll, Cory Wheeler and A Few Good Men.
There's so many ways to get inside of a woman. A knife, for example. A knife in the throat - the throat works out so well.
My inside stuff is coming out. And her inside stuff is coming out. And her inside stuff is red... red... red.
I've got a girl with me now, Angel. I've got her all tied up. She's been tied this way for hours... all tied up with a gag in her mouth. She's so helpless - so very, very helpless.
